isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Turbochargers - Remove - Turbocharger

step1.para: Remove oil feed supply tube nut located on top of oil filter header. Remove and discard tube nut O-ring.

figure.caption: Remove oil feed supply tube nut

step1.para: Remove two oil feed supply tube cap screws on top of turbocharger housing.

figure.caption: Remove oil feed supply tube cap screws

step1.para: Remove oil feed supply tube and tube flange gasket from turbocharger assembly. Discard flange gasket.
Cap oil feed supply tube fitting located on filter header.
Loosen turbocharger oil drain tube retaining plate cap screw from crankcase. Remove retaining plate and cap screw.
Remove two turbocharger oil drain tube cap screws at bottom of turbocharger housing.

Remove turbocharger oil drain tube retaining plate together with turbocharger oil drain tube, tube flange, two tube O-rings, and tube flange gasket from bottom of turbocharger assembly. Discard both drain tube O-rings (one on each end of drain tube) and flange gasket.

Cap all openings on turbocharger assembly. Use Turbocharger Intake Cap Set (ZTSE4296)
.

note.para: If plastic caps are not available, use duct tape to cover openings.

step1.para: Remove four nuts holding turbocharger assembly on exhaust manifold flange.

caution.para: To avoid possible engine or turbocharger damage, support turbocharger during removal and installation. Fasteners, turbocharger, and mounting plates could be bent or damaged.

step1.para: Remove turbocharger assembly and gasket from engine. Discard gasket.

caution.para: To avoid engine damage, do not operate engine without heat shield. Heat shield should not be removed for turbocharger replacement.

note.para: Special reusable locking flange nuts are used on the EVRT®. If lost or damaged, they must be replaced with the same locking nuts.

step1.para: Remove oil feed supply tube nut located on top of oil filter header. Remove and discard tube nut O-ring.
Remove turbocharger oil supply line. Discard old O-rings. New O-rings should be used for reassembly.
Remove air inlet and exhaust outlet, clamps, and piping.
Remove EVRT® assembly, by removing four flange nuts. Remove oil drain line at this time. Discard old O-rings.
